mapper.sql: userid, firstname, lastname, dob, telephone, email, address, hiredate, deptid, username, password, usertype_id, photourl
mapper.select:
select
from t_user
and userid = #{userid}
and firstname like '%${firstname}%'
and lastname like '%${lastname}%'
and dob like '%${dob}%'
and telephone like '%${telephone}%'
and email like '%${email}%'
and address like '%${address}%'
and hiredate like '%${hiredate}%'
and deptid = #{deptid}
and username like '%${username}%'
and password = #{password}
and usertype_id = #{usertype_id}
and photourl like '%${photourl}%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (userid, firstname, lastname, dob, telephone, email, address, hiredate, deptid, username, password, usertype_id, photourl) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_user
firstname = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastname = #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dob = #{dob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usertype_id = #{usertypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
photourl = #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set firstname = #{firstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastname = #{lastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dob = #{dob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype_id = #{usertypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, photourl = #{photourl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
